You can spend @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice in the following ways.  If an ability does not specify a specific amount of @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice, then you can spend up to as many @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice as you have available:

  • Divine Cure: As part of healing a creature, spend your @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice to increase the hit points recovered.  Alternatively, touch a creature and spend your @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice to heal it directly as an Action.
  • Divine Deflection: As a Reaction, you can spend @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice to decrease the attack roll of any creature within 30 feet. 
  • Divine Karma: As a Reaction, before you know the result of the roll, you can spend 1 @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die to decrease the number rolled on any (Save) check done by any creature within 15 feet.  This cannot be stacked.
  • Divine Protection: As a Reaction, spend your @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice to increase the number rolled on any (Save) check done by any creature within 15 feet. 
  • Divine Smite: As part of an attack action or spell attack that deals damage, you can spend @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice to increase the damage of the attack.  If you roll an Eikonic Number as part of the attack roll, deal 5 additional Radiant damage.
